title: where can i veiw old star news papers.looking for april 1 1934.its about the ethyl dow plant in kure beach
text:
Back issues of the StarNews and related newspapers are available on
microfilm at the New Hanover County Public Library's downtown
location.



Here's a link to a previous MyReporter.com post about the plant:
http://www.myreporter.com/?p=1280
